title: Death Stranding OFFICIALLY comes to Xbox Game Pass For PC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.19.22
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Death Stranding coming to Xbox Game Pass, Sonic Fronters info leaking, and High On Life getting delayed.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:37 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now! Bless and Janet talk about all of their hopes and dreams for the next PlayStation Showcase… Whenever that is. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:11 - Death Stranding is coming to PC Game Pass
00:20:36 - Star Wars Jedi is getting two new books!
00:26:44 -  Ad
00:29:02 - Sonic Frontiers release date and DLC ‘listed by promo material’
00:32:32 - NPD says MultiVersus was July’s best-selling video game in the US
00:37:32 - High On Life has been delayed
00:43:02 - Sega Genesis Mini 2’s full game lineup revealed
00:47:37 - Kena: Bridge of Spirits Is Getting a Big Update, and a Steam Version
00:50:43 - Out today
00:54:06 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Bless & Tim
Tuesday - Tim & Bless
Wednesday - Bless & Tim
Thursday - Bless & Tim
Friday - Bless & Whitta
